description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Quantity : 10
              
              -	Location : Hà Nội, HCM
              

              •	Develop mobile application for e-commerce system of Japanese Customer
              
              •	Design and build mobile applications for the iOS and/or Android platform.
              
              •	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	At least 2 years up experience
              
              •	Strongly experiences in Objective C and iOS Technology stack (UIKit, Core Data, Core Animation, iOS memory management, SQLite). Swift experience is a bonus / Android Technology stack (Android Architecture, UI programming, Google Service, Map SDK...),
              
              •	Experienced with web service programming via REST/SOAP/JSON/XML. Experienced in iOS/Android application performance tuning
              
              •	Good teamwork and communication skill. Willing to support other team member
              
              •	Self-motivated, self-disciplined, can work independently
              
              •	Bonus/Advantage: Knowledge in Dependency Injection in Android
              
              •	Has experiences with deploy app to Google Play store/or having app in Google play store
              

              Benefit:
              
              •	A very attractive salary package: 600$ - 1200$ plus “FPT care” insurance.
              
              •	13th month salary
              
              •	Performance Bonus salary
              
              •	Check Point yearly
              
              •	Private health care program
              
              •	All benefits based on Labor Law & FPT Software’s policy.
              
              •	Having the opportunity to work abroad
              
              •	Career grow to upper levels/ career grow and build up your own departmen
              

              Contact Person:
              
              Interested candidates should submit a completed Curriculum Vitae/ Résume and Cover Letter (if any) in Japanese to:
              
              Resource Assurance Incubation Center, FPT Software Hochiminh Co.Ltd
              
              Contact Person: Ms. Việt Hương
              
              Website	: www.career.fpt-software.com
              

              *** FPT Software – Where talents meet ***
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
